Is gajendra purohit necessary to watch? I didnâ€™t watch him for math1 and did only class notes and scored decently wellâ€¦how hard is math2 as compared to math1

Math 2 is almost entirely multiple variable integration, and there are a lot of formulas and problems, so yeah people tend to find it harder than math 1.  Some concepts like laplace and fourier transforms will really kick your ass if you don't listen in class, so please be attentive and take proper notes, sit in the front bench if you have to and torment your teacher with doubts if you're unable to understand anything. You'll have one easier unit on probability which has barely 4-5 topics and literally just involves substituting values in your calculator. I did better in Math 2, so it depends on the person.
